org.waarp.openr66.protocol.http.restv2.utils

Class XmlUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waarp.openr66.protocol.http.restv2.utils.XmlUtils

  • public final class XmlUtils
extends Object
    A series of utility methods for serializing and deserializing XML.
